import React from 'react'; import { Link, useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'; const VerifyOTP = () => { const history = useHistory(); const onVerifyOTPClick = () => history.push('/dashboard'); return (
Please enter verification token from your device

2-Step Verification

Enter the verification code generated by your phone ending in +xxx xxxxxxxx60.

Don't get code? Resend

) } export default VerifyOTP;
